topic.title: EMS Cardiac Arrest Event Section - conformance rules

ol.li: SHALL contain zero or one [0..1] code/@code="67799-7" EMS Cardiac Arrest Section (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)
SHOULD contain exactly one [1..1] title = "EMS Cardiac Arrest Event"

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entry
This entry SHALL conform to Derived Entry template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.24)
This entry SHALL contain zero or one [0..1] observation
This observation SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] @negationInd
Populate as true if NEMSIS EArrest.01 = "No"
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="ASSERTION" ASSERTION (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.4 HL7ActCode)
This observation SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] effectiveTime
NEMSIS Trace: EArrest.14
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type CD/@code="410429000" cardiac arrest (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.96 SNOMEDCT)
NEMSIS Trace: EArrest.01
This observation MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @inversionInd="TRUE"
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="SUBJ"
This entryRelationship Contains exactly one [1..1] observation
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="67503-3" Cardiac arrest cause (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type CD, where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet CardiacArrestCause 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.5.10 STATIC
NEMSIS Trace: EArrest.02
This observation MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @inversionInd="TRUE"
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="SUBJ"
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="67502-5" Cardiac arrest occurrence (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type CD, where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet CardiacArrestTiming 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.5.91 STATIC
NEMSIS Trace: EArrest.01
This observation MAY contain zero or one [0..1] informant
This informant SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="INF"
This observation MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @inversionInd="TRUE"
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="SUBJ"
This entryRelationship Contains exactly one [1..1] observation
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="67506-6" CPR prior to EMS arrival (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type BL
NEMSIS Trace: EArrest.05
This observation MAY contain zero or one [0..1] participant
This participant MAY contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="RESP"
This participant Contains zero or one [0..1] participantRole
This participantRole SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code, where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet PriorCareProviderRole 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.5.12 STATIC
This observation MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship
This entryRelationship SHALL contain zero or one [0..1] @inversionInd="TRUE"
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="SUBJ"
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="67508-2" AED use prior to EMS arrival (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type CD, where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet AEDUsePriorToEMSArrival 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.5.13 STATIC
NEMSIS Trace: EArrest.07
This observation MAY contain zero or one [0..1] participant
This participant Contains exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="RESP"
This participant MAY contain zero or one [0..1] participantRole
This participantRole SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code, where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet PriorCareProviderRole 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.5.12 STATIC
NEMSIS Trace: EArrest.08
This observation MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @inversionInd="TRUE"
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="SUBJ"
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="67513-2" Return of spontaneous circulation (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)
This observation SHALL contain zero or more [0..*] value with data type CD, where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet ReturnOfSpontaneousCirculation 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.5.15 STATIC
NEMSIS Trace: EArrest.12
This observation MAY contain zero or more [0..*] entryRelationship
Such entryRelationships SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @inversionInd="TRUE"
Such entryRelationships SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="SUBJ"
Such entryRelationships SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="67519-9" Cardiac rhythm (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type CD, where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet CardiacRhythmReading 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.5.16 STATIC
NEMSIS Trace: EArrest.17
SHALL contain zero or one [0..1] code/@code="67799-7" EMS Cardiac Arrest Section (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)
SHOULD contain exactly one [1..1] title = "EMS Cardiac Arrest Event"

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] entry
This entry SHALL conform to Derived Entry template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.24)
This entry SHALL contain zero or one [0..1] observation
This observation SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] @negationInd
Populate as true if NEMSIS EArrest.01 = "No"
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="ASSERTION" ASSERTION (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.4 HL7ActCode)
This observation SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] effectiveTime
NEMSIS Trace: EArrest.14
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type CD/@code="410429000" cardiac arrest (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.96 SNOMEDCT)

This observation MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @inversionInd="TRUE"
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="SUBJ"
This entryRelationship Contains exactly one [1..1] observation
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="67503-3" Cardiac arrest cause (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type CD, where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet CardiacArrestCause 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.5.10 STATIC
NEMSIS Trace: EArrest.02
This observation MAY contain zero or one [0..1] entryRelationship
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @inversionInd="TRUE"
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="SUBJ"
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation

This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type CD, where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet CardiacArrestTiming 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.5.91 STATIC

This informant SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="INF"

This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @inversionInd="TRUE"
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="SUBJ"
This entryRelationship Contains exactly one [1..1] observation
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="67506-6" CPR prior to EMS arrival (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type BL

This participant Contains zero or one [0..1] participantRole

This entryRelationship SHALL contain zero or one [0..1] @inversionInd="TRUE"
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="SUBJ"
This entryRelationship SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="67508-2" AED use prior to EMS arrival (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC)
This observation SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type CD, where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet AEDUsePriorToEMSArrival 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.5.13 STATIC

This participant Contains exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="RESP"
This participant MAY contain zero or one [0..1] participantRole
This participantRole SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code, where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet PriorCareProviderRole 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.5.12 STATIC
NEMSIS Trace: EArrest.08
